conservative.description: Conservative trading profile - high edge requirements, small positions

balanced.description: Balanced trading profile - moderate edge requirements, standard positions

aggressive.description: Aggressive trading profile - low edge requirements, larger positions

scalping.description: Scalping profile - very low edge requirements, frequent small trades

value.description: Value trading profile - high edge requirements, larger positions on strong convictions

profile_descriptions.conservative: Use when you want to minimize risk and only take high-confidence trades with strong edges
profile_descriptions.balanced: Good default for most trading scenarios - balanced risk/reward
profile_descriptions.aggressive: Use when you want to maximize trade frequency and are comfortable with higher risk
profile_descriptions.scalping: For high-frequency trading with very small edges and positions
profile_descriptions.value: For deep-value trades where you have very high conviction and strong edges
